articles.title: Scientists Warn: Popular Sugar Substitute Linked to Brain Cell Damage - SciTechDaily
articles.description: New research indicates that erythritol, a sugar substitute commonly recommended for individuals with obesity or diabetes, may carry unexpected health risks. From low-carb ice creams and keto-friendly protein snacks to “sugar-free” sodas, erythritol is a widel…
articles.content:
A common sugar substitute found in many “diet” and “low-carb” products might not be as harmless as once believed. Credit: Stock
